description: Data-independent acquisition (DIA)-MS analysis overtops the existing data-dependent acquisition (DDA)-MS analysis enabling deep proteome coverage and precise relative quantitative analysis in single-shot LC-MS/MS. We constructed a single-shot LC-MS/MS system with an MS measurement time of 90 min for a highly sensitive and deep proteomic analysis by optimizing the parameters of DIA and nanoLC. Furthermore, we applied this system to the proteomic analysis of cerebrums in germ-free and specific pathogen-free mice.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: DIA, SWATH, Single shot, HEK293 cell, cerebrum

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Kawashima Y, Watanabe E, Umeyama T, Nakajima D, Hattori M, Honda K, Ohara O Optimization of Data-Independent Acquisition Mass Spectrometry for Deep and Highly Sensitive Proteomic Analysis. Int J Mol Sci. 2019 Nov 26;20(23)

title: Optimization of data-independent acquisition-MS for deep proteome analysis
